name: SQR
description:
SQR is a short and difficult minimalist quick thinking puzzle game reminiscent of the golden age Flash games that inspired it.

In SQR you play as the titular SQR as they try to find their missing piece and escape.

To do this you will need to utilise SQR's unique ability to change colour to bypass (conveniently colour coded) obstacles, unfortunately SQR's trail can prove to be its own obstacle.

Features over 40 levels, a unique sound track and simple but surprisingly challenging gameplay
